speech: Ayurveda suggests promoting eye health with Triphala, Amla, Ghee, Saffron, Aniseed, and Rose Water. Triphala's antioxidants detoxify, while Amla's vitamin C benefits vision. Ghee aids lubrication, saffron combats inflammation, aniseed improves eyesight, and rose water soothes. Consult a healthcare professional for personalized advice.
